About Digri Brewery

Let me tell you a little about us

Beer Is For Everyone

We started to brew in december 2014 and have since brewed over 1700 liters of beer. We have 2 brewing machines, one is capable of brewing 60 liters and is called BrewEasy and one 30 liters which is called Grainfather. On brewing day we brew once on the Breweasy but twice on the Grainfather which yields in 120 liters on one brewday.

Award One

First price for an barleywine, Óðinn 12% at Fágun 2018.

Award Two

Third price for an IPA at Fágun 2018.

Award Three

Second Price for a imperial stout at Fágun 2019.
